root.name: Ecco the Dolphin
root.description: OverviewIn Ecco the Dolphin, you play as Ecco, a unique dolphin in his pod who has six star markings on his head. One day, while jumping out of the water with his friends, a whirlwind sucks everything except for him and the water into the sky. Ecco embarks on an journey to get back his pod that will take him across the oceans, into the arctic, back in time, and into an alien ship.TriviaEcco received a long-running comic series in Sonic the Comic (Fleetway).
